relics.name: Precious Necklace
relics.description: The first time each combat you play a hydrologistmod:Corporeal card, hydrologistmod:Flow.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes it just helps to keep me going.

relics.name: Loyal Boomerang
relics.description: At the end of each turn, place the top card of your discard pile into a random spot in your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: A loyal tool from a loyal friend.

relics.name: Twin Blades
relics.description: Whenever you apply hydrologistmod:Cold, gain 2 Block. Whenever you apply hydrologistmod:Heat, deal 3 damage to that enemy.
relics.flavorText: "Don't think of them as separate, because they're not."

relics.name: Cursed Cabbage
relics.description: At the start of each turn, if you have 10 or more cards in your hand, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies

relics.name: Glider Staff
relics.description: Unused draw from hydrologistmod:Flow carries over to the next turn.
relics.flavorText: A relic of the ancient Air Nomads.

relics.name: Spirit Mask
relics.description: Enemies that are Cool deal an additional 10% less damage. Enemies that are Hot take an additional 20% more damage.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes a disguise is the only excuse you need to be your truest self.

relics.name: Mystical Pouch
relics.description: Replaces Water Pouch. At the start of each combat, add the last card you played last combat to your hand and copy it.
relics.flavorText: It seems to have been enchanted to never run out of water.

relics.name: Spinning Stones
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Draw 1 less card at the start of each turn.
relics.flavorText: Probably the best trick I've ever seen.

relics.name: Tranquil Teacup
relics.description: Whenever you hydrologistmod:Transmute, you are given a choice between 3 cards.
relics.flavorText: "Do you know why they call me 'The Dragon Of The West'?"

relics.name: Discarded Sole
relics.description: At the start of each turn, add 2 Dazed to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Doesn't seem very useful. Maybe as a blindfold?

potions.name: Bottled Water
potions.description: Choose 1 of a random Ice, Water, and Steam card and add it to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Filtered Water
potions.description: Transmute any number of cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Adaptive
keywords.description:
An Adaptive X effect changes depending on the Subtype of the last card played this combat.
Ice: apply X Cold.
Water: gain 2X Block.
Steam: apply X Heat.

keywords.name: Cold
keywords.description: A Cool enemy deals 15% less damage with Attacks. If a Cool enemy becomes Hot, remove it, it loses triple its Cool amount in HP, and apply Thermal Shock for 1 turn.

keywords.name: Corporeal
keywords.description: A Corporeal card is any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

keywords.name: Ebbing
keywords.description: When an Ebbing card is discarded from your hand, play it.

keywords.name: Flow
keywords.description: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Heat
keywords.description: A Hot enemy takes 30% increased damage from Attacks. If a Hot enemy becomes Cool, remove it, it loses triple its Hot amount in HP, and apply Thermal Shock for 1 turn.

keywords.name: Mutable
keywords.description: When a card is Transmuted, any Mutable effect is passed on to the next card for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Purity
keywords.description: Cards grow stronger through the Transmutation process. Block gain and damage dealt are increased this combat.

keywords.name: Swappable
keywords.description: A Swappable card is Paired with another card and, while selected, can be freely Swapped between the two by pressing
